PF1.description: For Pathfinder 1e: modifiers of the same type do not stack; only the highest applies. Exceptions that stack include dodge, circumstance, and racial bonuses. Untyped modifiers always stack.

PF2.description: For Pathfinder 2e: modifiers of the same type do not stack; only the highest applies. Untyped modifiers always stack.

5e.description: For D&D 5e: no typed bonus system; all numeric modifiers sum.

SavageW.description: For Savage Worlds: no official typed bonus system in SRD; treat all modifiers as untyped and sum them.

DCC.description: For Dungeon Crawl Classics: no typed bonus system in SRD; treat all modifiers as untyped and sum them.
